name: Cutting the Deck
description: Infinite possibilities in infinite combinations. The temporal anomaly crisis offers a look into what could have been. But there are some who see this as an opportunity to stack the deck in their favor. Stop this treacherous intergalactic shuffle!
rules:
-- Unique Ferengi Alliance, Ferengi Traditionalist, and Romulan Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Quark, Seven, or Mariner will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Paris
featured_crew.flavor: Paris is in outer space with Torres. They're on the brink of death, and what better time to reveal their feelings?

featured_crew.name: Seven
featured_crew.flavor: Seven continues to develop her social skills, even playing the role of a bona fide member of Voyager’s crew.

featured_crew.name: Mariner
featured_crew.flavor: What is happening, and why does Mariner get older and older as she approaches the pergium? Is this some kind of joke?

rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Mariner
rewards.flavor: Beckett Mariner is a command ensign on the USS Cerritos. She breaks dumb rules that shouldn’t be there so she can do a better job!

rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Paris
rewards.flavor: Paris is in outer space with Torres. They're on the brink of death, and what better time to reveal their feelings?

rewards.name: Mariner
rewards.flavor: What is happening, and why does Mariner get older and older as she approaches the pergium? Is this some kind of joke?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: What is happening, and why does Mariner get older and older as she approaches the pergium? Is this some kind of joke?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Seize the advantage with the Ferengi Traditionalists.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

screens.text: "Grand Nagus Quark...has a nice ring, doesn't it, Captain? You know, I bet I have a lot to offer around here. I should start by making some changes around this old bar."

"How about you go back to your own universe and change your own bar? You know I held that title too. And if you hadn't been snatched from your time at just the right moment, you'd be a lowly bartender again, just like me!"
"Still, there must be some interest in exploring different possibilities one was never able to experience firsthand. As long as we can coexist with these different versions of ourselves, that is."

"Coexisting is the least of our worries. Some of these alternates pose a threat to the galaxy, especially if they team up with their prime universe counterparts. Think you can help us keep an eye on things, Captain?"
